WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE Server Error

The WWWOFFLE server encountered a fatal error:
$error
The program cannot continue to service this request.

Help

This is an internal WWWOFFLE server error that should not occur. There is no other way of handling the error apart from providing this warning page. If this error continues and WWWOFFLE is configured correctly and there are no other computer problems then you should report the error to the WWWOFFLE author.
